ComicInfo.Title: Blood Hunt; Dr. Spektor Part 8
ComicInfo.Summary:
In order to save his daughter, Turok and his new companions—the thieves Nettle and Marak—must venture to the merchant city of Ak-Tha. But in order to do so, they will have to cross the deadly Storm Lands – an eerie desert landscape plagued with terrifying lightning storms so strong that they warp the very fabric of space and time itself!
DOCTOR SPEKTOR PART 8: The story of the all-new master (and we use the term lightly) sorcerer continues…when Doc is late to a very important date – as the perils of having a demonic drinking buddy become clear.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Aaron Lopresti | 1 | B | Cover B | Alvaro Sarraseca & Triona Farrell | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Alvaro Sarraseca | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Variant Cover | Aaron Lopresti | 4 |
